name: Birdmen Paragliding
about: Birdmen Paragliding Academy is a full-service paragliding school based in Cape Town, South Africa. We offer a comprehensive range of courses from introductory to advanced levels, including basic paragliding licenses, paramotoring, and cross-over courses. Our training covers all aspects of paragliding, such as reading the weather, aerodynamics, and practical flying. Led by Barry Pedersen, with over 25 years of experience, we specialize in guided paragliding holidays and tours across notable sites like Table Mountain, Lionâ€™s Head, and the Garden Route. We provide affordable accommodation options and ensure a safe and enjoyable flying experience. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced pilot, Birdmen Paragliding Academy is dedicated to helping you achieve your flying goals.
services: ["Introductory Instructional Paramotor Tandem\nIntroductory Instructional Paragliding Tandem"]
